EmailTemplate.name: UK Thank you MMB
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your enquiry about moving to QuickBooks Online
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HTML Online Editor Sample
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was great to speak to you today about transferring your data to QuickBooks Online.
If you’re ready to make the move, please give me a call on {!User.Phone}. Otherwise, here’s some more information to help you make up your mind.
What is Movemybooks?
Movemybooks is a service that moves your company’s financial data to QuickBooks Online1. We work in partnership with Movemybooks to transfer your data swiftly and accurately.
How much does it cost to move to QuickBooks Online?
It’s completely FREE to transfer up to two years of transactions to QuickBooks Online2. Each extra year of transactions costs £60 + VAT.
How long will it take to move my data?
Once we have your data file, the conversion will be complete within 3 working days. (It’s usually faster than that, and often it’s done on the same day.)
What data can be moved?
Data that CAN be converted:
Data that CANNOT be converted:
Customer details
Departments / classes
Supplier details​
Budgets
Chart of accounts
Stock items
Account balances
Product / sales items
Customer balances
Sales / purchase orders
Supplier balances
Estimates
Up to two years of transactions​
Memorised transactions
Templates for invoices and other documents
Payroll and employee records​
Sorry, but if you use multicurrency, we can’t convert any of your company data.
What is the process for moving data to QuickBooks Online?
Once you’re ready to move, please give me a call on {!User.Phone} I’ll take your details and set up your QuickBooks Online account You will then receive an email telling you how to:
Give Movemybooks access to your QuickBooks Online account Upload your QuickBooks Desktop company file
I still have questions. Can I get more help?
If you give me a call thenI’ll be happy to answer any questions. You can also read the Movemybooks FAQ for more information.
To see QuickBooks Online in action, take a look at our pre-recorded webinar. It’ll help you understand how QuickBooks Online works and what extra capabilities it can give you.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} {!User.Phone}
